title: Rhubarb Crunch
instructions: In a large bowl, combine the chopped rhubarb and granulated sugar. Mix well and let it sit for about 10 minutes.
In another bowl, mix together the flour, cinnamon, and salt.
Add the rolled oats and brown sugar to the flour mixture, then pour in the melted butter. Stir until crumbly.
Spread the rhubarb mixture evenly in a greased baking dish.
Sprinkle the oat mixture over the rhubarb.
Bake in the preheated oven for 30-35 minutes or until the topping is golden brown and the rhubarb is tender.
Let it cool slightly before serving.
